content: Yes, many Irish pubs also offer live music and entertainment. Traditional Irish music is a big part of the pub culture in Ireland, with musicians often gathering to play traditional instruments such as the fiddle, accordion, and bodhrán. You will often find live music sessions in pubs all across Ireland, especially on weekends, where people come to sing, dance, and enjoy the lively atmosphere. Other forms of entertainment such as stand-up comedy, quizzes, and karaoke are also common in many Irish pubs.
